instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Charge light no, boot yes
threads.message: I have a 3437, that seems to be acting strange. The charge light does not display, however with the battery unplugged and the MagSafe plugged in, it will boot up as normal, after a while it shuts down however. No sign of corrosion or drop damage. Any idea?

threads.title: Charge light no, boot yes
threads.message: IO board and cable swapped? Could also be a stuck power button due to bad keyboard/trackpad/flat cable, unplug it and test if green light is back.
